number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activate = #{activate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where number_id = #{numberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_number set number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activate = #{activate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where number_id = #{numberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT number FROM t_number where level=#{level}
SELECT number,number_id,level FROM t_number WHERE level=#{level} and deleted=1
mapper.update: UPDATE t_number SET deleted = 1 WHERE deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM t_number WHERE level = #{level} AND deleted = 1
